preference.name: WRKFLW_update_PSL_on_root_action
preference.preference_description: Update the Process Stage List (PSL) of the Target objects of a workflow only when the root task start, completes or aborts. Valid Values: * true: Update PSL when root task starts, completes or aborts. * false: Update PSL for all tasks. This is the default value.
